titleStmt.title: The horrid, direful, prodigious and diabolical practice of the Jesuits discovered fully laying open the means, manner and circumstances whereby they inveagle and seduce inhumanely some unwary Protestants to the utter ruine and damnation of their souls : seasonably offered for the good of three nations / by E.G.
titleStmt.author: E. G.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
